briefTitle: Long Term, Follow-on Study of Lomitapide in Patients With Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
officialTitle: A Phase III, Long Term, Open Label, Follow on Study of Microsomal Triglyceride Transfer Protein (MTP) Inhibitor 'Lomitapide' (LOMITAPIDE) in Patients With Homozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
summary: This was a long term follow on study to assess the continued long term safety and efficacy of lomitapide in patients with homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change in Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C)
